subject: English
atomic_concept: We use our legs to walk.

nested_learning.intuition: Legs help us go from one place to another.
nested_learning.example: I walk to school using my legs.
nested_learning.application: Touch your legs and say: These are my legs.

misconception_fit: We do not walk with our hands.
Legs are not used to clap.
socratic_prompts: Which body part helps you walk?
Can you walk without using your legs?

difficulty_modes.medium: We use our legs to walk.
difficulty_modes.hard: Legs help us walk and move.
difficulty_modes.master: Legs are body parts used for walking and running.
